name: Rustam
nameDesc: "Avesto"dagi Raodastan so‘zidan yasalgan bo‘lib, ulkan gavdali, qudratli, botir, yengilmas, dovyurak, jasur, matonatli, bahodir. Abulqosim Firdavsiyning "Shohnoma" dostonidagi Zol o‘g‘lining ismi.

name: Rustamali
nameDesc: Rustamdek kuchli, qudratli o‘g‘ilni Ali o‘z panohida asrasin

name: Sino
nameDesc: Donishmand, hakim, olim yoki keksa, mo‘ysafid, ya’ni uzoq umr ko‘rsin

name: Suhrob
nameDesc: Qizil yog‘du, yoqut, la’l. Bu nom "Shohnoma" dostoni qahramoni Rustamning ismidir.
